name: Shoveling
description:
You play a shovel with Physics mechanics and also control your knight. You act like a boomerang and hit the enemies. Move on and reveal the story.

I tried to make an authentic gameplay style. It has a small story, and an arcade mode. 

How to Play and Controls:

  • Use WASD to move. Space to toggle between knight and shovel. You can think it like throwing your shovel, being able to control it and take it back to knight. 
    • S button also makes you dive faster meaning more damage.
  • Use K and L keys to scale shovel. Kill enemies with gaining momentum and hitting your shovel. 
    • Damage increases by heavier and faster shovel. Smaller shovel means being fast, but lowers damage. Heavier means you hardly move shovel, but you can deal great damage in situations like diving from above. 
  • Beware that your shovel can be stolen when health reaches 0! You have to restart that level when this happens. 
  • Use ESC go back to menu. 
  • Use R button If you die, or a bug happens, or simply want to restart. 

You have to eliminate all the enemies in order to go to next level. Enemy number will grow with time if you can’t kill them all. But it will stop when it reaches a number. 

Door will be opened when enemy count is 0.

I tried to teach the player step by step, using only shovel first, then adding knight.

Tip: You can create  oscillation by simply moving back and forth, you can cause more damage like this.
